review_title: So far impressed, but the complete lack of easily found documentation makes it difficult for the uninspired.,Great 360 camera despite some flaws.,Even The Best Camera Won't Work Without Better Software & Hardcore Hardware,Awesome 5.2K Spherical Videos; not so awesome software.,Best 360 camera for under $1000,BEWARE, DO NOT BUY!,Doesn't work with its own softwarep- makes it extremely difficult to use,Not worth the money!,Looks Great, shoots in night and day,This is an outstanding product, but the execution (particularly software/firmware) is not quite ready for sale.
